plot: A workaholic doctor who loses his fiancee and his memory in a car accident. Now he has to regain his broken memories to help him realize what is most precious to him.
title: Balloon in the Sky
plot_es: A workaholic doctor who loses his fiancee and his memory in a car accident. Now he has to regain his broken memories to help him realize what is most precious to him.
plot_en: A workaholic doctor who loses his fiancee and his memory in a car accident. Now he has to regain his broken memories to help him realize what is most precious to him.
